'''Atossa''' is a quest-exclusive NPC that appears in the {{Quest|Bedtime Story}}.

==Profile==
Atossa is a young woman from [[Vimara Village]]. As a child, she was found in the woods by the [[Forest Rangers]] and adopted by the people of Vimara Village. Within the memories implanted in her mind by [[Caribert (NPC)|Caribert]], she would often talk to Caribert underneath a certain tree, and grew close to him.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Cold Case Commission}}</ref> At the end of the quest series, she believes that Caribert "dumped" her due to his abrupt departure without saying goodbye. Though she is upset by this, she resolves to carry on and keep living life as usual.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|World-Order Narration}}</ref>

===Appearance===
She has brown hair tied into a bun, brown eyes, and a blue shirt offset with a short brown jacket. She wears a fingerless glove on her left hand, various pieces of gold jewelry, as well as blue leggings and sandals.

==Trivia==
* {{w|Atossa}} was the name of an Achaemenid empress and daughter of {{w|Cyrus the Great}}.
* She shares the same English voice actress with the [[Frost Operative|Fatui Frost Operatives]].
